member_organisations:
Member of:  
Society of Invertebrate Pathology (www.sipweb.org), 
Association of Applied Biologists (www.aab.org.uk), 
Tropical Agriculture Association (www.taa.org.uk). 
 
Horticulture board member of UK grower organisation: Agriculture and Horticulture Development Board (https://ahdb.org.uk). 
 
Editor of Manual of Biocontrol Agents (https://www.bcpc.org).
fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Research and innovation, Food Safety
eu_initiatives: Plant protection product legislation, biostumulant legislation, plant protection policy, sustainable agriculture.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
www.ibma-global.org 
 
I am currently vice-President of the International Biocontrol Manufacturers Association: this trade association acts as the voice of the biocontrol industry to express and share their views to further shape one common positioning towards institutional actors, policy makers, media and the public.
goals__remit: Rationale provides reputable expert advice and services to the biopesticide industry. The company combines in-depth knowledge of the industry with the skills needed to facilitate technology transfer between the diverse players - academia, policy makers, manufacturers, regulators and growers.  Rationale facilitates the process of placing products onto the market by streamlining product development, registration and marketing.
